play.info: I'm looking for and downloading the song!
play.error: There was an error playing the music
play.info2:
*You must put the song*

*Example:*
{0}play Miley Cyrus - Flowers
play.error2: There was an error searching for the song
play.cooldown: You must wait for the global cooldown since another user has already used the music command which is approximately 35 seconds to 45 seconds after its use.
